text: A demo without the usual hard left rent-a-crowd. Won’t that be something? #PeoplesVoteMarch
author: martinbright

text: A dozen ambulances heading up the Finchley Road in London. Any further info anyone?
author: martinbright

text: Am I really living in a country where the speaker of the parliament has just had to reassure MPs that they are not traitors? #BrexitCrisis
author: martinbright

text: May has an authoritarian streak. Appealing to the people over the heads of parliament is a classic political gambit - GCSE history, or dare I say O-level.
author: martinbright

text: You’re right
author: martinbright

text: That has to be the worst PM’s statement since... the last one. But how does she have the nerve to waste our time with that? #BrexitChaos
author: martinbright

text: A Prime Minister blaming parliament for this is not impressive leadership. She has said nothing, yet again. #BrexitChaos
author: martinbright

text: Do you think May and Corbyn have been watching Jacinta Ardern and decided that as they could never aspire to that level of leadership, they just won’t bother? #BrexitChaos
author: martinbright

text: Do you think May and Corbyn we have been watching Jacinta Ardern and decided that as they could never aspire to that level of leadership, they just won’t bother? #BrexitChaos
author: martinbright

text: @JolyonMaugham Thought you looked familiar! @trustforlondon
author: martinbright

text: Congratulations to @TomKibasi and his team at @IPPR for an excellent gathering at the Oxford Media Convention yesterday. #OMCippr @WorcCollegeOx great venue
author: martinbright

text: Just thinking tonight how much time I have spent chairing panels or on a panel or in a room facing a panel. Huge swathes of my existence... #panellife
author: martinbright

text: William Friese-Greene - inventor of the movie camera
author: martinbright

text: Thanks Su-Mei - it will involve people giving up power and that is very hard.
author: martinbright

text: Deborah Williams @tweetCDN talking about fundamental change  in the TV industry over “schemes” and entry-level jobs. #OMCippr
author: martinbright

text: Astonishing speech from Trevor Phillips raising issue of coverage of knife crime and failure to address issue of race #OMCippr “This is about people of colour”
author: martinbright

text: Final (and most important?) panel of the day on diversity at #OMCippr with Deborah Williams ⁦@tweetCDN⁩ Trevor Phillips and Su-Mei Thompson ⁦@sumeithompson1⁩
author: martinbright

text: James Currell of Viacom seems to be suggesting that children’s TV content will suffer as a result of restrictions on food advertising #OMCippr
author: martinbright

text: Just watching an extended advert/PR pitch for Viacom from European President James Currell at #OMCippr Can’t say I blame him given the opportunity but not really what I came here for
author: martinbright

text: Spoke too soon - panel on misinformation now speaking about public education. #OMCippr Has to be right that citizens have to take control while policy makers work on solutions
author: martinbright

text: Panel on misinformation at #OMCippr fascinating but mainly concerning high level regulation censorship and legislation. What about public education to allow people to make decisions about what my teenagers would call “chatting shit”?
author: martinbright

text: Good to hear @margot_james_mp bigging up @DavidLammy for highlighting challenges of his constituents #OMCippr
author: martinbright

text: Good to hear @margot_james_mp banging the drum for access and diversity at #OMCippr “the media really should go further and faster.” @CreativeSoc
author: martinbright

text: A bit uncomfortable watching Bénédicte Autret of @google being monstered at #OMCippr for her company’s sins. Discussion becoming a little personal. Am I being over-sensitive?
author: martinbright

text: “News is a more and more elitist sport” @pollycurtis #OMCippr
author: martinbright

text:
Good discussion on the newsroom of the future with @janinegibson @pollycurtis Bénédicte Autret of 
@google and @MimiTurner01 - does make up of panel suggest things are already changing?#OMCippr @IPPR
author: martinbright

text: “Can’t reach the audience of the future with the staff of the past,” says Mark Thompson, CEO of @nytimes in response to @CreativeSoc at @IPPR Oxford Media Convention #OMCippr Improving access and diversity #missioncritical
author: martinbright

text: Listening to Mark Thompson of NYT at #OMCippr I realise he was there when @CreativeSoc was founded 10 years ago. How much has changed in terms of access and diversity since then?
author: martinbright

text: Looking forward to attending the @ippr Oxford Media Convention later today
author: martinbright

text: Watching I, Delours, fascinating  documentary about the Troubles by @edmoloney48 - feels like a good day to watch it
author: martinbright

text: This is the most moving tribute I have seen this weekend
author: martinbright

text: Extreme right-wing tossers are already a minority
author: martinbright
